column4: Anyone know how to do a mIRC style auto chanserv ident for xchat?
does xchat have the mirc style scripting where i can do "on 1:connect: { if ($server == irc.blah.net and then send the command
no, xchat uses external plugins, PERl or Python script for eexample
you can do scripting for xchat, if you know something like Perl/Python etc...
